songs.title: Hold Me Down
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Could never met the kind
They keep the stars aligned
Turn out on the spot
Watch it all pass by

[Hook]
I lie here awaiting for the tears
While I pass the years

[Verse 2]
I kinda seemed to move
Nothing more to lose
Waiting in the base
That we used to use

[Hook]
I lie here awaiting for the tears
While I pass the years

[Chorus]
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down

[Verse 3]
It's dirty like it is
Everything's a mess
I can only save but your last kiss

[Hook]
I lie here awaiting for the tears
While I pass the years

[Verse 4]
I cannot show my face
Blurred in your embrace
I am controlling your taste

[Hook]
I lie here awaiting for the tears
While I pass the years

[Chorus]
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down

[Bridge]
These memories
Weigh on me
I make believe
It sets me free
I long for you...

[Chorus - Outro]
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
You hold me down
